summary: Project includes an admin dashboard with booked students management and a student portal. Adding a meeting link feature to sessions.

existing_features.title: In the Admin Dashboard → Booked Students → StudentDetailView (add/edit session form), add a meeting platform selector (Google Meet, Zoho Meet, Zoom) and a meeting link URL input field. When a session already has a meeting link, display it with Edit and Delete (clear) actions alongside the session entry.

In the Student Portal (StudentDashboard and/or StudentPortal schedule/sessions tab), for each session that has a meeting link, display a prominent clickable 'Join Class' button that opens the meeting URL in a new tab. Sessions without a meeting link should show no button.

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin Dashboard -> Booked Students: Add meeting platform selector (Google Meet, Zoho Meet, Zoom) and meeting link field when adding/editing a session, with ability to add/edit/delete the meeting link after session creation
Student portal: Display meeting link as a clickable 'Join Class' button that opens the meeting link directly

Extend the backend session data type (CourseSession or equivalent) to include an optional meeting platform field (variant: #googleMeet, #zohoMeet, #zoom) and an optional meeting link URL string. Provide backend functions to add, update, and delete the meeting link on an existing session.
